title: Global Catastrophes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/20/20
itunes:title: Global Catastrophes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/20/20
description:
George Noory and geological researcher Randall Carlson explore his theories on disasters like the flood of the Bible and changes to the Sun that could wreck havoc on the planet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
